meanings.definition: a person who takes part in an activity or event
meanings.sent1: The participant in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The science fair had many participants showcasing their projects.
meanings.sent3: The participant in the baking competition accidentally used salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated participant in the choir, her voice soaring above the rest.
meanings.sent5: The young participant eagerly raised their hand to answer the question.

meanings.definition: someone who is involved in something
meanings.sent1: As a participant in the discussion, he shared his thoughts on the topic.
meanings.sent2: The company welcomed new participants to join their team.
meanings.sent3: The participant in the meeting brought donuts for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: She was a key participant in the project, always offering innovative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The enthusiastic participant volunteered to help with the event setup.
